// frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.js import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, ProgressBar, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Hammer, TagFill, CashCoin } from 'react-bootstrap-icons'; function DashboardPage() { // Placeholder data - we will fetch this from the API later const summaryData = { turnover: "2.165.718,97", expenses: "27.779,60", stockValue: "5.866.290,98" }; const assets = { total: "11.560.589,33", cash: "2.910.802,80", stock: "5.866.290,98", receivables: "2.783.495,54" }; const liabilities = { total: "8.389.285,60", payables: "8.389.285,60" }; // Calculate percentages for progress bars const cashPercent = (parseFloat(assets.cash.replace(/\./g, '').replace(',', '.')) / parseFloat(assets.total.replace(/\./g, '').replace(',', '.'))) * 100; const stockPercent = (parseFloat(assets.stock.replace(/\./g, '').replace(',', '.')) / parseFloat(assets.total.replace(/\./g, '').replace(',', '.'))) * 100; const receivablesPercent = (parseFloat(assets.receivables.replace(/\./g, '').replace(',', '.')) / parseFloat(assets.total.replace(/\./g, '').replace(',', '.'))) * 100; return ( <>

Ana Sayfa (Homepage)

{/* Top Summary Cards */}
Ağustos Cirosu (August Turnover) TL {summaryData.turnover}
Ağustos Masrafları (August Expenses) TL {summaryData.expenses}
Stok Değeri (Stock Value) TL {summaryData.stockValue}
{/* Assets and Liabilities */}

Varlıklar (Assets) - TL {assets.total}
Kasa (Cash){assets.cash}
Stok (Stock){assets.stock}
Açık Hesap (Receivables){assets.receivables}

Borçlar (Liabilities) - TL {liabilities.total}
Açık Hesap (Payables){liabilities.payables}
 ); } export default DashboardPage;
